challenges.title: Ball Barrage
challenges.description: Dodge a rapid-fire stream of tennis balls from all directions.

challenges.title: Speed Boost Zones
challenges.description: Hit the glowing zones to gain a burst of speed and outrun obstacles.

challenges.title: Spinning Machines
challenges.description: Navigate through unpredictable spinning ball machines.

challenges.title: Net Traps
challenges.description: Jump over or slide under tricky nets that appear suddenly.
